Subject: Request for Payment – AU Transfer Amendment Fees
Body:
Dear John,

We hope this email finds you well.

This is to inform you that an amendment fee of AUD 1,250 has been applied to Loan Account AU-347921 
due to the recent transfer modification requested on March 20, 2025. Please find the attached invoice for reference.

Kindly arrange payment by April 5, 2025 to avoid any delays in processing. Below are the payment details:

Bank Name: XYZ Bank
Account Number: 098-765-4321
SWIFT Code: XYZBAU33
Reference: AU-347921 Amendment Fee

If you have any questions or require further clarification, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
Emma Richardson
Loan Servicing Officer
XYZ Bank
Phone: +61 2 9876 5432
